definition: Diary of a Madman by Lu Xun 魯迅|鲁迅[Lu3 Xun4]

sentences.english: They are too conscientious and responsible to drive like manias .
sentences.chinese: 妇女格外谨慎，责任心也强，不会像狂人一样开飞车。

sentences.english: America is the country that helped liberate a continent from the march of a madman.
sentences.chinese: 美国曾帮助把一个大陆从一个狂人的铁蹄下解放出来。

sentences.english: He stumbled down the stairs like a madman.
sentences.chinese: 他像狂人般地跌跌撞撞地走下了楼。

sentences.english: Emoney is no longer just a matter of geeks playing games.
sentences.chinese: 电子货币不再只是几个电脑狂人玩游戏了。

sentences.english: His enthusiasm swayed Manstein into allowing the offensive to continue for a "few more days".
sentences.chinese: 他的狂人自信让曼施泰因允许再进行“几天”的进攻。

sentences.english: I was going to dive in and become a full-time healing junkie.
sentences.chinese: 我打算埋头探究并成为一个全职的治疗狂人。

sentences.english: Why, you some kind of war junkie?
sentences.chinese: 怎么回事，你是那种战争狂人吗？

sentences.english: As geeks and nerds, we’re super-excited by touch.
sentences.chinese: 作为电脑狂人和达人，我们对触摸技术都非常痴迷。

sentences.english: Appearance of Madman's Diary attracted lots of writers.
sentences.chinese: 《狂人日记》的出现，引起了文学界的重视。

sentences.english: It's just the ravings of a madman.
Military enthusiasts begin re-enacting Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 军事狂人重演越南战争游戏。

sentences.english: Hehehehe, may you become a gal proud of your English.
sentences.chinese: 恩，英语狂人，也是我的梦想哦。

sentences.english: Gonzo is a techno-geek at heart.
sentences.chinese: Gonzo在内心里是一位技术狂人。

sentences.english: And I guess I became quite the skilled maniac in the end.
sentences.chinese: 我想我最后已经成为一个相当专业的偷车狂人了。

sentences.english: This kind person is in loco forum, maniac forum has big. Of course.
sentences.chinese: 这类的人在火车头论坛，狂人论坛有大把的。
高尔夫球手，赌徒，汽车收集狂人。

definition: to snort disdainfully/to scoff at/to turn up one's nose
to pose as/to flaunt oneself as/to boast of/to brag
Dugu Qiubai, a fictional character appearing in 金庸[Jin1 Yong1] novels
